data.title: World Wide Technology wins Dell Technologies North America Partner of the Year Award 2023
data.meta_description: WWT and Dell Technologies help businesses become industry leaders by harnessing the key drivers of transformation and innovation across solution areas
data.text:
Today, World Wide Technology (WWT) is proud to announce that it has been named Dell Technologies 2023 North America Partner of the Year.

Dell Technologies, one of the leading technology companies in the world, recognized WWT for being a top-performing partner across all lines of business - going above and beyond to empower customers and help them solve their greatest challenges and realize their greatest opportunities.

As Dell Technologies' first-ever Titanium Black partner, WWT leverages more than 25 years of partnership expertise and 250+ Dell certifications to design, test and deliver best-in-class, integrated solutions that accelerate digital transformation and drive our customers' businesses forward.

In FY23, WWT empowered its Fortune 500 customers across various industries to successfully secure and integrate $2B dollars' worth of Dell solutions. WWT and Dell Technologies help these businesses become industry leaders by harnessing the key drivers of transformation and innovation across solution areas that include IT infrastructure, Digital Workforce and Security.

"World Wide Technology is honored and grateful to receive the Dell Technologies 2023 North American Partner of the Year award. Our expert team works hard every day to provide clients with access to a comprehensive services portfolio – including hands-on access to 150+ Dell solutions in our Advanced Technology Center," said Bob Olwig,EVP, Global Partner Alliances. "Together, Dell and WWT have forged a powerful alliance that leverages our respective strengths and delivers transformative solutions that address the ever-evolving needs of our clients. We look forward to the year ahead and continue to focus on leading-edge capabilities like Helix, Cyber Resiliency and so much more."

To learn more, search Dell Technologies on wwt.com.

About World Wide Technology

Founded in 1990, World Wide Technology (WWT), a global technology solutions provider with $17 billion in annual revenue, combines the power of strategy, execution and partnership to accelerate digital transformational outcomes for large public and private organizations around the world. Through its Advanced Technology Center, a collaborative ecosystem of the world's most advanced hardware and software solutions, WWT helps customers and partners conceptualize, test and validate innovative technology solutions for the best business outcomes and then deploys them at scale through its global warehousing, distribution and integration capabilities.

With nearly 9,000 employees and more than 55 locations around the world, WWT's culture, built on a set of core values and established leadership philosophies, has been recognized 12 years in a row by Fortune and Great Place to Work® for its unique blend of determination, innovation and leadership focus on diversity and inclusion. With this culture at its foundation, WWT bridges the gap between business and technology to make a new world happen for its customers, partners and communities.
